itunes:title: Episode 411 - North AND South
title: Episode 411 - North AND South
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Jennifer Marshall who is one of the most prominent military veteran actress's working today.  She chats about what is was like starring in Stranger Things season 2... and then th...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Jennifer Marshall who is one of the most prominent military veteran actress's working today.  She chats about what is was like starring in Stranger Things season 2... and then things go off the rails as we pitch her a gay Civil War romance movie called "North and South".
